verbs.description: [ARG0: The U.S.] [V: recognized] [ARG1: Jerusalem] [ARG2: as the capital of Israel] and formally opened its embassy there today -- fulfilling a campaign pledge of President Donald Trump and a stated goal of many politicians in both parties . " Big day for Israel . Congratulations ! " Trump tweeted this morning .

[ARG0: The U.S.] recognized Jerusalem as the capital of Israel and [ARGM-MNR: formally] [V: opened] [ARG1: its embassy] [ARGM-LOC: there] [ARGM-TMP: today] -- [ARGM-ADV: fulfilling a campaign pledge of President Donald Trump and a stated goal of many politicians in both parties . " Big day for Israel . Congratulations] ! " Trump tweeted this morning .
